template.name: Multipage PDF Reportv3
template.template_md:
{% block content %} ~~A cover~~ # Report Example
Company 123 anywhere st City, State zip
me@here.com https://example.com
~~/A~~ ~~A~~ {{ client.name }} Agents List {% for item in data_sources.agentsList %} {% endfor %}
Agent Info Site Name Client Name
{{ item.hostname }}
OS:{{ item. }}
Last Seen:{{item.last_seen}}		 {{ item.site__name }} {{ item.site__client__name }}
~~/A~~ {% endblock %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentAllFields:
    defer:
    - services
    - wmi_detail
    filter:
      site__client_id: '{{client.id}}'
    model: agent
